translations: v．查明，弄清，确定：通过调查、研究或实验来发现事实或信息。
· The detective ascertains the truth of the case.
侦探查明了案件的真相。

sentences.sentence: SetRouterType ascertains whether to use in-memory channels or JMS topics.
sentences.translation: setRouterType查明是否使用内存中(In - memory)通道或JMS主题。

sentences.sentence: Each of these testing methods ascertains the software product quality in different functional areas.
sentences.translation: 每种测试方法确定软件产品在不同功能区域的质量。

sentences.sentence: He also ascertains that parents are happier grocery shopping and even sleeping than spending time with their kids.
sentences.translation: Gilbert教授另有断言：当爹当娘的把时间花在逛超市买东西，甚至睡觉上，要比陪着子女更能让他们开心。
